Updates

22 Sept 2024

"Ixion's Realm" is born!

It's taken over a month, but I've completely rebuilt the website from the ground up.

  • Brand new static site built on 11ty
  • Responsive 2-column layout
  • Embedded image galleries that work on desktop and mobile
  • Cool new theme inspired by Sega Genesis
  • 'Game Reviews' of some of my childhood game designs
  • Expanded list of my special interests
  • Details about me and a new portrait of my sona Ixion

Old Designs

Placeholder page called 'self-in-progress'

This was the first incarnation of the webiste. It only contained a list of things I like, and a webneko named Lucy.
